multiple-choice.question: You flip a fair coin 7 times; these coin flips are independent of each other. Define the random variables [defs] X = the number of heads in these 7 coin flips, [/defs] and [defs] Y = the number of tails in these 7 coin flips. [/defs] Which of the following is true?
multiple-choice.answer: The random variables $X$ and $Y$ are independent.
The random variables $X$ and $Y$ are not independent.
